targets.expr:
sum by (method, instance) (increase(rpc_request_duration_seconds_sum{job="ethrex L1", instance=~"$instance(:\\d+)?$", method="engine_newPayloadV4", namespace="engine"}[18s])) 
/ sum by (method, instance) (increase(rpc_request_duration_seconds_count{job="ethrex L1", instance=~"$instance(:\\d+)?$",method="engine_newPayloadV4", namespace="engine"}[18s]))

panels.description: Latency difference: positive = ethrex is faster (lower latency). Shows (other - ethrex) in ms.

targets.expr: (sum by (instance) (increase(rpc_request_duration_seconds_sum{job="ethrex L1", instance="ethrex-mainnet-1:3701", method="engine_newPayloadV4", namespace="engine"}[18s])) / sum by (instance) (increase(rpc_request_duration_seconds_count{job="ethrex L1", instance="ethrex-mainnet-1:3701", method="engine_newPayloadV4", namespace="engine"}[18s]))) * 1000

panels.title: Latency Difference (positive = ethrex faster)

panels.description: Throughput difference: positive = ethrex is faster. Shows (ethrex - other) in gas/s.
panels.title: Throughput Difference (positive = ethrex faster)

panels.description: Throughput plotted against block number instead of time. This allows comparing performance at the same blocks across clients.
panels.title: Ggas/s by Block Number (MAINNET)

panels.description: Block processing latency plotted against block number. Allows comparing latency at the same blocks across clients.

targets.expr: (sum by (instance) (increase(rpc_request_duration_seconds_sum{job="ethrex L1", instance="ethrex-mainnet-1:3701", method="engine_newPayloadV4", namespace="engine"}[18s])) / sum by (instance) (increase(rpc_request_duration_seconds_count{job="ethrex L1", instance="ethrex-mainnet-1:3701", method="engine_newPayloadV4", namespace="engine"}[18s]))) * 1000

panels.title: Latency by Block Number (MAINNET)

panels.description: Latency difference by block number. Positive = ethrex is faster (lower latency). Shows (other - ethrex) in ms.

targets.expr: max without (BuildTimestamp,Commit,Version) (nethermind_last_block_processing_time_in_ms{instance="nethermind-mainnet-1:6060"}) - on() ((sum (increase(rpc_request_duration_seconds_sum{job="ethrex L1", instance="ethrex-mainnet-1:3701", method="engine_newPayloadV4", namespace="engine"}[18s])) / sum (increase(rpc_request_duration_seconds_count{job="ethrex L1", instance="ethrex-mainnet-1:3701", method="engine_newPayloadV4", namespace="engine"}[18s]))) * 1000)

(reth_consensus_engine_beacon_new_payload_last{instance="reth-mainnet-1:6060"} * 1000) - on() ((sum (increase(rpc_request_duration_seconds_sum{job="ethrex L1", instance="ethrex-mainnet-1:3701", method="engine_newPayloadV4", namespace="engine"}[18s])) / sum (increase(rpc_request_duration_seconds_count{job="ethrex L1", instance="ethrex-mainnet-1:3701", method="engine_newPayloadV4", namespace="engine"}[18s]))) * 1000)

panels.title: Latency Difference by Block Number (MAINNET)

panels.description: Throughput difference by block number. Positive = ethrex is faster. Shows (ethrex - other) in Ggas/s.
